pkg.name: page-alert
pkg.title: Page alert
pkg.description: Page alerts are colour-coded, non-disruptive notifications that provide Success, Error, Warning or Information messages at relevant times during the user journey. They should not be confused with Callouts.

scope.title: Page alert

relatedComponents.name: callout
relatedComponents.title: Callout
relatedComponents.description: Callouts are an excerpt of text used to draw attention to important or interesting information. They should not be confused with Page alerts.

relatedComponents.name: global-alert
relatedComponents.title: Global alert
relatedComponents.description: Global Alerts show pressing and high-signal messages, such as system alerts.
